dict.acceptation: 游戏，运动；比赛，竞赛；诡计；运动会；
受伤的，瘸的；对…有兴趣的；雄赳赳的；关于野味的；

sent.orig: Frank is the man who drives Chelsea on from midfield game after game after game.
sent.trans: 弗兰克是那个坐镇中场为切尔西一场紧接着一场比赛的男人。

sent.orig: Also label mobile phone game one of sort of network game according to game terminal again.
sent.trans: 又根据游戏终端将手机游戏也列为网络游戏的种类之一。

sent.orig: Dominated by a giant panda called Zuma game. Add a rebound game board game mode.
sent.trans: 一款由大熊猫为主角的祖玛游戏。游戏中添加了反弹板等游戏模式。

sent.orig: A terrific game Tetris game, added a subtitle-stacked, it has increased the difficulty of the game!
sent.trans: 非常棒的一款俄罗斯方块游戏的游戏，加了个副标题-层叠，游戏难度有所增加吧！

sent.orig: Keywords: Netwok game; Indulge in the network game; The network game addiction synthesizes the disease.
sent.trans: 关键词：网络游戏；网络游戏沉迷；网络游戏成瘾综合症。
